CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
2020 – date LUBREX FZC  
Position: Marketing Manager – Global  
After gaining a local & MEA Regional experience for more than 8 years, she moved to the GCC team 
handling leading premium Brand Persil as well as the digital marketing champion for the GCC region .  
Building, planning and successfully implementing Strate gic Marketing Plan globally.  
• 360 degree Re -Branding for Lubrex Brand across all communication supports: Development of 
online and offline Brand guidelines, Lead design Brand portfolio strategy, Repositioning of the 
Brand globally,…etc.  
• Develop across -Marketing Business Strategies (Retail / B2C / B2B). Communications Plans, 
Lead digital business transformation: Design Digital Strategy and Media Plan. Re -Launch the 
Social Networks + Digital platforms (Oil finder) + e -commerce platforms (Amazon).  
• Overseein g the development of marketing literature: Brand and Products Guidelines, Technical 
flyers, Product catalogus, TDS, MSDS...  
• Campaign development and deployment for both ATL and BTL channels.  
• Working closely together with regional and global Sales teams a nd Distributors, to develop 
adapted Marketing Strategy for each Market (over 80 markets around the world). •Demonstrate 
strategic implementation progress to deliver growth.  
 • Development of Global Branding Strategy along with Reward & penalty Points system to control 
worldwide Brand visibility, ensuring corporate comply with Branding standards and guidelines.  
• Development of Global Trade Marketing Strategy.  
• Design and implementation of promotions (Service stations, Retails, Lubricants, etc), loyalty 
program s, mobile applications and other sales incentive programs, for both retailers and 
Distributors.  
• Developing and globally launching strategic products, to lift up Brand positioning and enhance 
Brand Product Portfolio along with RnD Department. (First UAE lu bricant manufacturer to 
produce and export Biodegradable Hydraulic oils, First UAE lubricant manufacturer to produce 
and export Racing and extreme sports lubricants ranges).  
• Development, launch and Distribution of new product ranges for off -road and extre me sports 
application (Racing cars, Racing motorcycles, Dirt bikes ): overlooking and handling Technical, 
Marketing, legal, Sales and operation aspects.  
• Sponsorship Programs: Evaluate, recommend and lead negotiation with key media partners, 
sponsorship o pportunities, and local marketing assets (Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Aaron 
Mare – won 1st place in GCC and 4th Globally).  
• Participation and sponsorship and International Event Management: Automechanika  
• Work actively with Marketing teams in both Deploym ent and Development functions.  
• Work closely together with internal functions, such as operations team, pricing, technical 
department, sales, product line administration and global business service center.  
 
2020 – 2020 Emirates Flavours & Fra grances – EFF 
Position: Regional  Business Development Marketing Manager – MENA  
• Actively involved in Marketing, Sales and Research.  
• Responsible for building and maintaining positive relationship with distributors, clients, partners 
and suppliers.  
• Building up new business opportuniti es with distributors and clients for new and existing 
markets.  
• Providing Management with market and project reports.  
• Competitive Intelligence.  
• Overseeing the development of marketing literature: Brand and Products Guidelines, Technical 
flyer

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
